PreStartSourceData: mkdir -p GenericApplication && cd GenericApplication && if [ ! -f altv-server ]; then if command -v wget >/dev/null 2>&1; then wget -O altv-server https://cdn.alt-mp.com/server/release/x64_linux/altv-server && chmod +x altv-server; elif command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -L -o altv-server https://cdn.alt-mp.com/server/release/x64_linux/altv-server && chmod +x altv-server; fi; fi && ls -lh altv-server

mkdir -p GenericApplication/data && cd GenericApplication/data && for f in vehmodels.bin vehmods.bin pedmodels.bin weaponmodels.bin; do if [ ! -f "$f" ]; then if command -v wget >/dev/null 2>&1; then wget -O "$f" "https://cdn.alt-mp.com/server/release/x64_linux/data/$f"; elif command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -L -o "$f" "https://cdn.alt-mp.com/server/release/x64_linux/data/$f"; fi; fi; done

cat > GenericApplication/server.cfg << 'EOF'
name: Regenesis
host: 0.0.0.0
port: 7788
httpPort: 7780
players: 128
password: 
token: 
announce: false
gamemode: Freeroam
website: 
language: en
description: Alt:V Multiplayer Server
modules: [ ]
resources: [ ]
EOF
